author: Simon Difford
description: This rum based Tom Collins is basically a long Daiquiri with soda.
name: Pedro Collins
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws
